name: TimothyDocs
summary: Timothy is a cloud base storage system designed to document your work
short_description:
Timothy is a cloud based documentation system. Timothy will document
any endeavor because it will store not only the documents created
during the project but also store information about those files.

Like most storge schemes timothy creates a hierarchy of
categories through which one may browse.  Timothy displays information
about the document or category as well as its name.  This use of meta
data explains the structure and content of the project to the user
as he browses.

Users make better informed decisions about where to file a document
when this information is available to them.  It also suggests where to
look for a long lost document.
